name: Oniric
description:
A single traveler chosen to carry the Lantern of Dreams, and cursed to face the darkness. You must ensure the survival on Dreams and that the light shines evermore. 

A simple 2D game and my first attempt at releasing a game anywhere. I'm very proud of this game and I will continue to add on to this game as well many more! So stay tuned! And feel free to show your support and notes on the game. 

Controls:

A, D = Move left and right

←,  → = Move left and right

Space bar = Dash, 3 second cool down
